content.html: Hallmarks of great leaders: • Public executions. Need to strike the right balance between individual and mass executions to keep people guessing! • Dancing on graves. All those people you just killed actually SUCKED! Let their families know! Let everyone know! Have a party!
content.value:
Hallmarks of great leaders:

• Public executions. Need to strike the right balance between individual and mass executions to keep people guessing!

• Dancing on graves. All those people you just killed actually SUCKED! Let their families know! Let everyone know! Have a party!
